title: CRUD Operation
description: This is a project  refer to the basic functions of persistent storage: Create (add new records), Read (retrieve existing records), Update (modify existing records), and Delete (remove existing records).

title: Role Based Authentication
description: Role-Based Authentication is a security process that assigns permissions to users based on their roles within an organization, ensuring that users can only access resources and perform actions permitted by their role.

title: Web Scrap
description: This project involves extracting data from websites using automated scripts to gather and process information for various purposes such as analysis, research, or application development.
